details.intro: Jalaj Saryu is situated at Village Mangalsi in Ayodhya district.
details.concept: Jalaj Saryu integrates a production and training unit.
activity: Ram ki Pairi is the Saryu river-front, which features a long stretch of ghats and gardens.
Witness various patches of natural farming in this village.

howToReach.airport: Chaudhary Charan Singh Airport in Lucknow, approx 132km.
